dct_title_s: Ware Afbeeldinghe van de starcke Stadt Rochelle
dct_description_sm: Geordonneert ende afgeterykent door den Heer de Siette... Jaer 1627 ; C.J. Visscher excudebat 1628.
Relief shown pictorially and by shading.
Bar scale on map given in "Schale van vadem" (also "Echelee de toisses").
Index within text at bottom: Tafel om te vinden de notabelste plaetsen inde Stadt Rochelle.
Depicts siege of La Rochelle, showing fortifications, fleet, troops.
Decorative cartouche, compass roses, fortification plans, topography, vegetation, ships.
French text in lower right; French scale statement on bar scale.
Inset map: Kaarte van de Kusten van Rochel, S. Martyn, Oleron, ende de gheles gentheyt daer omtrent; bar scale on map given in "Milaria Gallica".
